# [에이블런] [프론트엔드부트캠프] 5주차 1차시 TIL

### 오늘 학습 내용

## responsive_page
지난 차시에 배운 내용을 활용한 responsive_page Layout를 만들었다.

![responsive_page](img/responsive_page.webp)

#### HTML

#### SCSS
```scss
@import 'reset';

*{
    box-sizing: border-box;
    transition: all 0.5s;
}

#header{
    width: 100%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;

    .inner{
        width: 1180px;
        height: 120px;
        margin: auto;
        position: relative;

        >h1{
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            bottom: 15px;

            >a{
                font: bold 24/1 arial;
                color: #444;
            }
        }

        .menu_web{

            #gnb{
                position: absolute;
                right: 0;
                bottom: 0;
                display: flex;

                li{
                    // float: left;

                    a{
                        display: inline-block;
                        padding: 14px 40px;
                        font: bold 14px/1 arial;
                        color: #777;
                        
                        &:hover{
                            color: #fff;
                            background-color: #555;
                        }
                    }

                }
            }
        }

        #util{
            position: absolute;
            top: 20px;
            right: 10px;
            display: flex;
            gap: 20px;
    
            li a{
                font: 12px/1 arial;
                color: #999;
            }
        }

        .btnCall{
            display: none;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            position: absolute;
            right: 30px;
            top: 50px;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            
            
            &::before{
                content: '';
                display: block;
                width: 100%;
                height: 2px;
                background: #000;
                position: absolute;
                top: 0;
                left: 0;
                transition: all 0.5s;
            }
            &::after{
                content: '';
                display: block;
                width: 100%;
                height: 2px;
                background: #000;
                position: absolute;
                bottom: 0;
                left: 0;
                transition: all 0.5s;

            }

            span{
                display: block;
                width: 100%;
                height: 2px;
                background: #000;
                position: absolute;
                top: 50%;
                margin-top: -1px;
                left: 0;
                text-indent: -9999px;
                transition: all 0.5s;
            }

            &.on{
                &::before{
                    top:50%;
                    margin-top: -1px;
                    transform: rotate(45deg);
                }
                &::after{
                    bottom:50%;
                    margin-bottom: -1px;
                    transform: rotate(-45deg);
                }
                span{
                    transform: translateX(100%);
                    opacity: 0;
                }
            }
        }

        .manu_mobile{
            z-index: 10;
            display: none;
            width: 270px;
            height: 100vh;
            background: #333;
            padding: 35px 30px;
            transition: all 0.5s;
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: -271px;
            

            &.on{left: 0;}

            >h1{
                border-bottom: 1px solid #666;
                padding-bottom: 30px;

                a{
                    display: block;
                    font: bold 24/1 arial;
                    color: #fff;
                    text-align: center;
                }
            }

            #gnb-mobile{
                li a{
                    display: block;
                    width: 100%;
                    padding: 20px 0;
                    font: bold 14px/1 arial;
                    color: #ddd;
                    text-align: center;
                    border-bottom: 1px solid #444;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

#visual{
    width: 100%;

    }
    
    .inner{

            right: 50px;

                    width: 100%;
                    opacity: 1;
                }
                img#point {
                    transform: rotate(360deg);
                }
                img#sound {
                    opacity: 0;
                }
            } 
            #mute-line{
                display: block;

                top: 50%;
                left: -20%;

                height: 2px;
                transform: rotate(45deg);
                transition: all 0.5s;
    
                &::before{
                    content: '';
                    display: block;
                    width: 0%;
                    height: 100%;
                    border-radius: 1px;
                    background-color: #fff;
                    transition: all 0.5s;
                    opacity: 0;
                }
                
            }
            img {
                position: absolute;
                width: auto;
                height: 100%;
                opacity: 1;
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }
        }

        .con{
            width: 100%;

        }

    }

}
```

#### JS
```js


const btnCall = document.querySelector(".btnCall");
const menuMobile = document.querySelector(".manu_mobile")

btnCall.addEventListener("click",(e)=>{
    e.preventDefault();
    btnCall.classList.toggle("on")
    menuMobile.classList.toggle("on")
})

// sound ---------------------------------------------
const muteBtn = document.querySelector("#muted-btn");
const visualAMV = document.querySelector("#visual video")
let muteIs = true;
visualAMV.volume = 0.3;

muteBtn.addEventListener('click', ()=>{

    muteBtn.classList.toggle("on");
    muteIs = !muteIs
    visualAMV.muted = muteIs;
})

// btns --------------------------------------------
const sections = document.querySelectorAll("figure, section");
const btns = document.querySelectorAll(".btns li");
let base = 200;

let posArr = [];
sections.forEach((sec, i)=>{
    posArr.push(sec.offsetTop);
})

btns.forEach((btn, i)=>{
    btn.addEventListener("click", (e)=>{
        e.preventDefault();

        let isOn = e.currentTarget.classList.contains("on");
        window.scroll({
            top: posArr[i],
            left: 0,
            behavior: "smooth"
        })

        if(isOn) return
        for(let el of btns){
            el.classList.remove("on")
        }
        btns[i].classList.add("on")
    })
})

window.addEventListener("scroll", e=>{
    let scroll = window.scrollY + base;

    sections.forEach((el,i) =>{
        if(scroll >= posArr[i]){
            for(let el of btns){
                el.classList.remove("on")
            }
            btns[i].classList.add("on")
        }
    })
})
```

#### 여담
오늘 배운 내용은 실전 활용에 대한 감을 잡기 좋은 예시가 되었다.<br>
내일은 공휴일이기에 내일 이 소스코드를 활용해 이 사이트를 더 보완해보려 한다. - 해당 내용은 3.5차시로 업로드 예정
